DOCX Inline Formatting Demo

This document demonstrates inline run properties (w:rPr) applied directly in document.xml without using styles.xml. Each section shows the style name, a styled sample, the corresponding run XML, and a note about CSS equivalence or approximation.

Bold

Sample Text

Run XML:

<w:r>
  <w:rPr><w:b/></w:rPr>
  <w:t>Sample Text</w:t>
</w:r>

CSS mapping: Direct CSS: font-weight: bold;

Italic

Sample Text

Run XML:

<w:r>
  <w:rPr><w:i/></w:rPr>
  <w:t>Sample Text</w:t>
</w:r>

CSS mapping: Direct CSS: font-style: italic;

Bold + Italic

Sample Text

Run XML:

<w:r>
  <w:rPr><w:b/><w:i/></w:rPr>
  <w:t>Sample Text</w:t>
</w:r>

CSS mapping: Direct CSS: font-weight: bold; font-style: italic;

Underline single

Sample Text

Run XML:

<w:r>
  <w:rPr><w:u w:val="single"/></w:rPr>
  <w:t>Sample Text</w:t>
</w:r>

CSS mapping: Direct CSS: text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-style: solid;

CSS mapping: No exact CSS; approximate with: text-decoration-line: underline; (CSS underlines spaces as well).

Superscript

Regular Text vs. Sample Text

Run XML:

<w:r>
  <w:rPr><w:vertAlign w:val="superscript"/></w:rPr>
  <w:t>Sample Text</w:t>
</w:r>

CSS mapping: Approximate CSS: vertical-align: super; font-size: smaller;
